General.Name: Hangzhou Greenda Electronic Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Greenda Electronic Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and servicing of high-purity electronic chemicals in China and internationally. It offers wet electronic chemicals; hydrochloric, nitric, sulphuric, hydrofluoric, acetic, fluosilicic, and phosphoric acid; tetramethylammonium hydroxide; isopropanol; "-butyrolactone; n-methyl pyrrolidone; KOH developer; and Cu etchant, as well as electronic grade buffer oxidation etchant. It also provides potassium hydroxide, ammonium bifluoride, sodium hexafluorosilicate, hydrogen peroxide, thinner, electronic grade Al etchant, electronic grade stripper, and electronic grade ITO Etchant and IGZO etchant. The company offers its products for TFT-LCD, IC, PV, and other industries. Hangzhou Greenda Electronic Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 9936, Hong 15th Road, Hangzhou, China, Hangzhou
